verses.verse: Set the <S%H7782>trumpet<s%> to your <S%H2441>mouth.<s%> He shall come as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> they have <S%H5674>transgressed<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and trespassed <S%H5921>against<s%> my <S%H8451>law.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> to me, My <S%H430>God,<s%> we <S%H3045>know<s%> you.
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H2186>cast<s%> off the thing that is <S%H2896>good:<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> him.

They have set up <S%H4428>kings,<s%> but not by me: they have made <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> it not: of their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> have they <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H6091>idols,<s%> that they may be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.

Your <S%H5695>calf,<s%> O <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> has <S%H2186>cast<s%> you off; my <S%H639>anger<s%> is <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them: <S%H349>how<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> will it be <S%H3808>ere<s%> they <S%H3201>attain<s%> to <S%H5356>innocence?<s%>

For from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was it also: the <S%H2796>workman<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> it; therefore it is not <S%H430>God:<s%> but the <S%H5695>calf<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall be <S%H7616>broken<s%> in pieces.

For they have <S%H2232>sown<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and they shall <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H5492>whirlwind:<s%> it has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7054>stalk;<s%> the <S%H6779>bud<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7058>meal:<s%> <S%H194>if<s%> so be it <S%H6213>yield,<s%> the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> shall <S%H1104>swallow<s%> it up.
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> is <S%H1104>swallowed<s%> up: now shall they be among the <S%H1471>Gentiles<s%> as a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> wherein is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure.<s%>
For they are <S%H5927>gone<s%> up to <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> a <S%H6501>wild<s%> <S%H6501>ass<s%> <S%H909>alone<s%> by himself: <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H8566>hired<s%> <S%H158>lovers.<s%>

<S%H1571>Yes,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they have <S%H8566>hired<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H6908>gather<s%> them, and they shall <S%H2490>sorrow<s%> a <S%H4592>little<s%> for the <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8269>princes.<s%>
<S%H3588>Because<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> has <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> to <S%H2398>sin,<s%> <S%H4196>altars<s%> shall be to him to <S%H2398>sin.<s%>
I have <S%H3789>written<s%> to him the <S%H7239>great<s%> things of my <S%H8451>law,<s%> but they were <S%H2803>counted<s%> as a <S%H2114>strange<s%> thing.

They <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> for the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of my <S%H1890>offerings,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> it; but the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7521>accepts<s%> them not; <S%H6258>now<s%> will he <S%H2142>remember<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sins:<s%> they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

For <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> his <S%H6213>Maker,<s%> and <S%H1129>builds<s%> <S%H1964>temples;<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> has <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5892>cities:<s%> but I will <S%H7971>send<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> on his <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H759>palaces<s%> thereof.
